an9.66:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five grasping aggregates.
an9.66:1.3: The grasping aggregates of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
an9.66:1.4: These are the five grasping aggregates.
an9.66:2.1: To give up these five grasping aggregates you should develop the four kinds of mindfulness meditation. …”
